title: Correct: Hero MotoCorp 2Q Net Profit Jumps on Lower Taxes
text:
(Hero MotoCorp's 2Q net profit fell 10% from INR9.77 billion a year earlier. "Hero MotoCorp 2Q Net Profit Jumps on Lower Taxes," at 0023 GMT on Wednesday, misstated the direction of the profit move in the headline, first and second paragraphs, and gave the wrong comparative figure in the second paragraph. Net profit fell from INR9.77 billion, it didn't rise from INR7.97 billion. The correct version follows:)

Hero MotoCorp 2Q Net Profit Falls on Lower Sales

By Ian Walker

Hero MotoCorp Ltd. (500182.BY) reported a 10% drop in second-quarter net profit as sales fell amid a prolonged slowdown in the Indian automotive market.

Net profit in the July-to-September quarter was 8.79 billion rupees ($124.2 million), down from INR9.77 billion in the same quarter a year ago, the Indian two-wheeler maker said in a stock-exchange filing Wednesday.

Hero was expected to post net profit of INR7.85 billion, according to the consensus estimate on FactSet.

Revenue for the period stood at INR76.60 billion compared with INR91.68 billion a year ago.

The company, which has launched five new products in the first five months of the fiscal year, said retail sales during the ongoing festive season have been steady so far.
